name: TO ACT OUT
meanings: to define or explain something by using your body, gestures, arms and hands
to show strong emotion or to act with strong emotion

name: TO ADD UP TO
meanings: to equal or be a certain amount
something (information) to make sense or to seem correct

name: TO ASK OUT
meanings: to ask someone you're attracted to do something with you
to ask someone to be in a relationship with you, to be dating

name: TO ASK AROUND
meanings: to ask several people a question to get the best response

name: TO BACK OUT
meanings: to decide not to do something that you previously said you would do, to renew, to change your mind

name: TO BACK UP
meanings: to move backwards
to support
to add evidence, support to something like research

name: TO BE AFTER SOMEONE / SOMETHING
meanings: to be chasing someone
to be looking for someone or something

name: FOR SOMEONE TO BE ALONG

name: TO BE AWAY; TO BE AWAY ON SOMETHING
meanings: to be gone, away

name: TO BE DOWN ON SOMEONE OR SOMETHING

name: TO BE DOWN WITH AN ILLNESS
meanings: to be sick with something

name: TO BE FED UP WITH SOMEONE OR SOMETHING
meanings: to be angry, upset, frustrated

name: FOR SOMEONE TO BE IN
meanings: to be present, available

name: FOR SOMEONE TO BE IN ON SOMETHING
meanings: to be part of something, to know what's happening

name: FOR SOMEONE TO BLOW UP

name: TO BLOW SOMETHING UP

name: SOMEONE / SOMETHING TO BREAK DOWN

name: TO BREAK IN / INTO SOMETHING
meanings: to use force to enter something, to forcibly enter

name: TO BREAK SOMETHING IN

name: FOR NEWS TO BREAK
meanings: for there to be new news, a new piece of important news

name: TO BREAK LOOSE FROM SOMETHING

name: TO BREAK THROUGH UP

meanings: to separate something by force, to make into separate, individual pieces

name: FOR SOMETHING TO BREAK OUT
meanings: for something to happen very quickly and without warning

name: TO BREAK OUT OF A PLACE

name: TO BREAK UP WITH SOMEONE

name: TO BRING ABOUT SOMETHING

name: TO BRING THE PRICE DOWN

name: TO BRING UP SOMETHING
meanings: to mention something, to introduce a topic into a conversation

name: TO BE BURNING UP

name: TO CALL AROUND
meanings: to ask several people the same question over the telephone

name: TO CALL SOMEONE BACK
meanings: to return someone's call, to call someone after they called you

name: TO CALL OFF SOMETHING
meanings: to cancel something (like an event)

name: TO CALL ON SOMEONE
meanings: to pick or choose someone to answer a question or give a response

name: TO CALL SOMEONE UP

name: TO CALM DOWN

name: TO NOT CARE FOR SOMETHING

meanings: to transfer something to another time

name: TO CHANGE OVER

name: TO CHECK IN/TO CHECK OUT

meanings: to see  how someone is, see how someone is doing

name: TO CHIP IN FOR SOMETHING

name: TO CLEAN UP

name: TO COME FORWARD
meanings: to volunteer to do something

name: TO DRESS UP

meanings: to make more expensive, costlier

name: TO DROP IN / TO DROP BY

name: (HAIR AND TEETH) TO FALL OUT

name: (FOR SOMETHING) TO FALL OFF

name: TO FIGURE SOMETHING OUT
meanings: to understand something, to discover something learn how something works

name: TO FILL SOMETHING IN/OUT

name: TO FILL SOMETHING UP

meanings: to discover something, to learn something that you didn't know before
